defs.docs: # Bevy Kira audio

attributes.value: / This crate is an audio plugin for the game engine Bevy. It uses the library
/ Kira to play audio and offers an API to control running audio.

defs.name: Audio
defs.docs: Bevy Audio Resource

attributes.value: / Use this resource to play and control your audio

defs.name: play
defs.docs: Play audio in the default channel

attributes.value: / Play audio in the default channel

defs.name: play_looped
defs.docs: Play looped audio in the default channel

attributes.value: / Play looped audio in the default channel

defs.name: stop
defs.docs: Stop all audio in the default channel

attributes.value: / Stop all audio in the default channel

defs.name: pause
defs.docs: Pause all audio in the default channel

attributes.value: / Pause all audio in the default channel

defs.name: resume
defs.docs: Resume all audio in the default channel

attributes.value: / Resume all audio in the default channel

defs.name: set_volume
defs.docs: Set the volume for the default channel

attributes.value: / Set the volume for the default channel

defs.name: set_panning
defs.docs: Set panning for the default channel

attributes.value: / Set panning for the default channel
/ Values up to 1 pan to the right
/ Values down to 0 pan to the left

defs.name: set_playback_rate
defs.docs: Set playback rate for the default channel

attributes.value: / Set playback rate for the default channel

defs.name: play_in_channel
defs.docs: Play audio in the given channel

attributes.value: / Play audio in the given channel

defs.name: play_looped_in_channel
defs.docs: Play looped audio in the given channel

attributes.value: / Play looped audio in the given channel

defs.name: stop_channel
defs.docs: Stop audio in the given channel

attributes.value: / Stop audio in the given channel

defs.name: pause_channel
defs.docs: Pause audio in the given channel

attributes.value: / Pause audio in the given channel

defs.name: resume_channel
defs.docs: Resume audio in the given channel

attributes.value: / Resume audio in the given channel

defs.name: set_volume_in_channel
defs.docs: Set the volume for the given channel

attributes.value: / Set the volume for the given channel

defs.name: set_panning_in_channel
defs.docs: Set panning for the given channel

attributes.value: / Set panning for the given channel
/ Values up to 1 pan to the right
/ Values down to 0 pan to the left

defs.name: set_playback_rate_in_channel
defs.docs: Set playback rate for the given channel

attributes.value: / Set playback rate for the given channel

defs.name: AudioChannel
defs.docs: A channel to play audio in

attributes.value: / A channel to play audio in
/ You can play audio in this channel and controll
/ properties like the volume, playback rate or panning

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Create a new AudioChannel

defs.name: AudioSource
defs.docs: A source of audio data

defs.name: Frame
defs.docs: A single Frame of an audio stream

attributes.value: / A single Frame of an audio stream

defs.name: left
defs.docs: Value of the left channel in the given frame

attributes.value: / Value of the left channel in the given frame

defs.name: right
defs.docs: Value of the right channel in the given frame

attributes.value: / Value of the right channel in the given frame

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Creates a frame with the given left and right values

attributes.value: / Creates a frame with the given left and right values

defs.name: from_mono
defs.docs: Creates a frame using the given value for left and right

attributes.value: / Creates a frame using the given value for left and right

defs.name: AudioStream
defs.docs: An audio stream producing frames

defs.name: next
defs.value: pub fn next(&mut Self, f64) -> Frame
defs.docs: Produce the next frame in the audio stream

attributes.value: / Produce the next frame in the audio stream

defs.name: StreamedAudio

attributes.value: / Use this resource to start and stop audio streams

defs.name: stream
defs.docs: Start an audio stream in the default channel

attributes.value: / Start an audio stream in the default channel

defs.name: stop
defs.docs: Stop all audio streams in the default channel

attributes.value: / Stop all audio streams in the default channel

defs.name: stream_in_channel
defs.docs: Start an audio stream in the given channel

attributes.value: / Start an audio stream in the given channel

defs.name: stop_channel
defs.docs: Stop all audio streams in the given channel

attributes.value: / Stop all audio streams in the given channel

defs.name: AudioPlugin
defs.docs: A Bevy plugin to add audio functionallity

attributes.value: / A Bevy plugin to add audio functionallity
/ Add this plugin to your Bevy app to get access to

defs.name: AudioStreamPlugin
defs.docs: A Bevy plugin for streaming of audio

attributes.value: / A Bevy plugin for streaming of audio
/ This plugin requires [AudioPlugin] to also be active
/ # use bevy_kira_audio::{AudioStream, Frame, StreamedAudio, AudioChannel, Audio, AudioPlugin, AudioStreamPlugin};
